description: Domain layer components including converters, models, and repository interfaces following clean architecture principles

components.ServiceCategoryConverter: Clean architecture converter translating between Drift database models and ServiceCategory domain models.

rules: Clean architecture converter decoupling database implementation from business logic layer.
Bidirectional conversion supporting both fromDrift and toDrift transformations for complete data flow.
List conversion utilities supporting bulk operations and efficient batch processing.
Domain model factory methods with ID generation for new service category creation.
Default color handling ensuring consistent visual representation when colors are not specified.
Error handling with fallback values ensuring application stability during data conversion.
Timestamp management bridging database and domain model temporal concerns.

components.ServiceConverter: Clean architecture converter translating between Service data models and Service domain models.

rules: Clean architecture converter decoupling data layer from business logic layer through model translation.
Bidirectional conversion supporting both fromDataModel and toDataModel transformations.
List conversion utilities supporting bulk operations and efficient batch processing.
Domain model factory methods with ID generation for new service creation.
Complete field mapping ensuring no data loss during model conversion.
Timestamp preservation maintaining data integrity across layer boundaries.

components.ServiceCategoryDomain: Immutable domain model for service categories with business logic methods and UI integration utilities.

rules: Immutable domain model using Freezed for complete decoupling from database implementation details.
JSON serialization support enabling data persistence and API integration.
Color conversion utilities transforming hex color strings to Flutter Color objects.
Icon mapping system providing appropriate icons based on service category names.
Search functionality with case-insensitive matching for category filtering.
Business logic methods including timestamp management and update tracking.
Default values ensuring consistent behavior with fallback color and active status.
Error handling in color parsing with graceful fallback to default colors.

components.ServiceDomain: Immutable domain model for services with business logic methods and formatting utilities.

rules: Immutable domain model using Freezed decoupled from database implementation details.

Integer category ID support matching database schema requirements.

components.ServiceRepository: Abstract repository interface defining service data operations contract for clean architecture implementation.

rules: Abstract repository interface following clean architecture principles by abstracting data access concerns.
Domain model contracts ensuring implementations work with domain entities rather than database models.
Comprehensive CRUD operations supporting full service and service category lifecycle management.
Category-based service filtering enabling organized service management and display.
Soft delete operations preserving data integrity while supporting logical deletion.

Clean separation between service and service category operations enabling focused implementations.
